entry.title: [PATCH] Change recommended fee to 0.001 BTC
entry.summary: A request has been made to change the minimum recommended transaction fee on the Main tab in the Options dialog. The current recommendation of 0.01 BTC is approximately $0.50 at today's price, but the request suggests changing it to 0.001 BTC or lower. Changes have been made to the optionsdialog.ui file and the localization files for various languages, including bg.ts, ca_ES.ts, cs.ts, da.ts, de.ts, el_GR.ts, en.ts, es.ts, es_CL.ts, et.ts, eu_ES.ts, fa.ts, fa_IR.ts, fi.ts, fr.ts, fr_CA.ts, gu_IN.ts, he.ts, hi_IN.ts, hr.ts, hu.ts, it.ts, ja.ts, lt.ts, nb.ts, nl.ts, pl.ts, pt_BR.ts, pt_PT.ts, ro_RO.ts, ru.ts, sk.ts, sr.ts, sv.ts, th_TH.ts, tr.ts, uk.ts, zh_CN.ts, and zh_TW.ts.The Bitcoin software provides an optional transaction fee per KB which helps ensure that transactions are processed quickly. Most transactions are 1 KB in size, and a fee of 0.01 is recommended. However, recent updates to the software suggest a lower fee of 0.001 to be used instead. This information is provided in multiple language translations including Spanish, Estonian, Basque, Persian, Finnish, French, Hebrew, Hindi, Croatian, and Hungarian. These translations can be found in their respective files within the src/qt/locale/ directory of the Bitcoin repository.The context provided contains translations of a specific message in multiple languages. The message is related to an optional transaction fee per kilobyte that helps make sure transactions are processed quickly. Most transactions are 1 kilobyte, and the recommended fee is 0.001 BTC or equivalent. The translations are provided in different language files for each language. Some of the languages included in the context are Italian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese (both Brazilian and European), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, and Serbian.The context consists of the changes made in the transaction fee per kB for different languages. The recommended fees have been reduced from 0.01 to 0.001 in all languages to ensure quicker processing of transactions. The code changes in different files of different languages, including bitcoin_sv.ts, bitcoin_th_TH.ts, bitcoin_tr.ts, bitcoin_uk.ts, bitcoin_zh_CN.ts, and bitcoin_zh_TW.ts reflect these changes. The file bitcoin_uk.ts also includes a Ukrainian translation of the optional fee per kB.
